page.title: 15RECREATION
page.content: and less for five-day membership. There are also reduced fees for country members and juniors. A recent development in the area has been the opening of Briggens Hotel which is situated in Briggens Park, north-east of Roydon. Access to the hotel is either from the north side of the level-crossing at Roydon or from the A 414. The Hotel grounds contain a nine-hole golf course, but this is used mostly by hotel guests, many of whom are attending small business con- ventions - an important part of the hotel's business policy. There is only one public hall in the area. This is Roydon Village Hall, which has been partly altered in recent years and is well used by local amateurs for plays, as well as for the many other village activities.
